name: Locus Technologies
tag_list: ghg, sustainability, carbon-managment, environmental-software, environmental-data-managemnet, water-footprint, carbon-footprint
overview:
Organizing environmental information using cloud computing.

Locus provides the world’s most comprehensive on-demand software to organize environmental data and information, and to manage water footprint and greenhouse gases (GHGs) and much more. Locus is the partner of choice for all organizations looking to be credible in all of their environmental reporting, water, energy, carbon compliance and sustainability needs.

Locus’ suite of environmental data management on-demand software products was designed by domain experts to serve the needs of environmental professionals. Locus products are offered online as a service, allowing customers to enjoy the benefits of state-of-the-art software solutions at a fraction of the cost of building and maintaining comparable systems. Locus’ products provide a complete environmental information management solution to manage the range of complex environmental data and information generated during environmental activities.

Locus offers ePortal solution, where you “mix and match” Locus’ individual products into an integrated whole solution. Locus’ ePortal enables companies to integrate individual products for a custom solution that fits enterprise environmental management and reporting needs.

Without ePortal, it is as tough as putting a jigsaw puzzle together with no picture on the box and no direction inside; each piece of the puzzle (each Locus application) has a wonderful shape and color and its own particular meaning. Locus ePortal provides the picture on the box, instructions and much more - integration and interoperability.
